name: Robert Connell Clarke
title: Our Notes
knownFor: Author of *Marijuana Botany*, *Hashish!*, and *Cannabis: Evolution and Ethnobotany*

bio: Clarke’s systematic documentation of cannabis biodiversity bridges biology and cultural preservation — directly influencing ZZX-Labs’ data classification, archive design, and agricultural metadata frameworks.
